document.full_text: a court will hear oral arguments on june 8 in a government appeal of a federal judge's ruling that struck down president barack obama's landmark healthcare overhaul law as unconstitutional.
document.title: court sets june date to hear healthcare appeal
lines_and_colors: a court will hear oral arguments on june 8 in a government appeal of a federal judge's ruling that struck down president barack obama's landmark healthcare overhaul law as unconstitutional.
